name: Solazzo Apartment Homes
address: 8506 Villa La Jolla Dr, La Jolla, CA 92037
parking: 2 parking spots included, $60 for each additional spot
utilityDetails: Water, trash, sewer, gas & electric, not included in rent
holdingPeriod: 72 hours to hold an apartment before losing the required $200 hold deposit
housingDeposit: $600-$800, or an amount equal to two months' rent, depending on approval guide
verification: State issued I.D. card, passport, driver license, military I.D. card
proofOfIncome:
Students will need co-signers and guarantors. 
 Co-signers/Guarantors must make 4 times the rent amount to qualify
leaseTerm: 12 Months

name: La Regencia
address: 7681 Palmilla Drive, San Diego, CA
petPolicy: Pets accepted; two pet maximum, weight and breed restrictions apply
parking: Each apartment is designated one parking spot. Parking is assigned.
utilityDetails: Water, trash, sewer, gas & electric, not included in rent
housingDeposit: Based on income, credit and rental history, applicants may be required to pay an additional security deposit of up to 2x the market rental rate.
proofOfIncome:
Combined gross monthly household income must exceed 2.5x the monthly rental amount. 
 Adult student applicants require I-20, J1 or financial aid letter confirming the name of the school and the number of months the student will be receiving financial aid. If the student receives living expense stipends from a third party (e.g. a parent), you can use that amount to determine the student's income.
leaseTerm: Please contact property for available lease terms

petPolicy: This community is a NO PET community.
parking: Garage and Assigned Parking
utilityDetails: Water, trash, sewer, gas & electric, not included in rent
holdingDeposit: There is a holding deposit of $1,000.00 for a 1 bedroom, $1,200.00 for a 2 bedroom and $1,500.00 for a 3 bedroom.
housingDeposit: Based on income, credit and rental history, applicants may be required to pay an additional security deposit of up to 2x the market rental rate.
proofOfIncome:
Combined gross monthly household income must exceed 2.5x the monthly rental amount. 
 Adult student applicants require I-20, J1 or financial aid letter confirming the name of the school and the number of months the student will be receiving financial aid. If the student receives living expense stipends from a third party (e.g. a parent), you can use that amount to determine the student's income.
leaseTerm: Please contact property for available lease terms

name: La Jolla Palms Apartment Homes
address: 3535 Lebon Dr, San Diego, CA 92122
parking: Gated parking with elevator access to home floor level
utilityDetails: Water, trash, sewer, gas & electric, not included in rent
holdingPeriod: 72 hours to hold an apartment before losing the required $200 hold deposit
housingDeposit: $600-$800, or an amount equal to two months' rent, depending on approval guide
verification: State issued I.D. card, passport, driver license, military I.D. card
proofOfIncome:
Students will need co-signers and guarantors. 
 Co-signers/Guarantors must make 4 times the rent amount to qualify
leaseTerm: 12 Months
